feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2025.1.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Allow resetting rate limit sleep interval by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/570
  • [Enhancement] Re-check if media is pending immediately before download by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/571

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2025.1.14...v2025.1.17

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2025.1.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Ensure a full indexing pass always runs if the source has never been indexed before by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/581
  • [Enhancement] Add support for UMASK environment variable by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/582
  • [Enhancement] Run fast indexing on source creation and at higher priority by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/583
  • [Enhancement] Auto-update yt-dlp by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/589

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2025.1.17...v2025.1.27

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2025.2.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Support Multiple YouTube API Keys by @rebelonion in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/606
  • [Enhancement] Download failures due to videos being members-only are not immediately retried by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/609
  • [Enhancement] Record and display errors related to downloading by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/610
  • [Bugfix] Improve YouTube shorts detection for new YouTube pants by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/618

New Contributors

  • @rebelonion made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2025.1.27...v2025.2.20

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2025.3.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Improve yt-dlp permissions to allow auto update by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/634
  • [Enhancement] Add option for a source to only use cookies when needed by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/640
  • [Enhancement] Retry a download using cookies if doing so might help by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/641

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2025.2.20...v2025.3.6

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2025.3.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Add download rate limiting to app settings by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/646
  • [Enhancement] Stop logging Docker healthcheck requests by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/659
  • [Enhancement] Add setting to restrict filenames to ASCII characters by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/660

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2025.3.6...v2025.3.17
